library_catalog: Virtual Electrical Designer - EEE Component Libraries
description: Comprehensive component libraries supporting all electrical and electronic devices (EEE)

libraries.name: resistors.json
libraries.description: Standard resistor values with common ratings
libraries.usage: For DC and AC resistance networks

libraries.name: capacitors.json
libraries.description: Capacitor library with electrolytic and film types
libraries.usage: For coupling, filtering, and timing circuits

libraries.name: inductors.json
libraries.description: Inductor library with various core materials
libraries.usage: For filtering, tuning, and energy storage

libraries.name: sources.json
libraries.description: DC and AC voltage and current sources

libraries.name: semiconductors.json
libraries.usage: For rectification, switching, and signal control

libraries.name: diodes.json
libraries.description: Switching diodes, rectifiers, Zener, Schottky, bridge rectifiers, photodiodes

libraries.name: passive_advanced.json
libraries.description: Thermistors, varistors, potentiometers, fuses, LDR, thermal protection
libraries.usage: Temperature sensing, surge protection, variable resistance

libraries.name: power_semiconductors.json
libraries.description: MOSFETs, IGBTs, thyristors, triacs, GTOs, Darlingtons

libraries.name: analog_ics.json
libraries.description: Op-amps, comparators, voltage regulators, audio amplifiers

libraries.name: digital_ics.json
libraries.description: Logic gates, counters, microcontrollers, memory, timers

libraries.name: sensors.json
libraries.description: Temperature, pressure, distance, light, motion, humidity sensors

libraries.name: electromechanical.json
libraries.description: Motors, relays, solenoids, contactors, circuit breakers, pumps

libraries.name: rf_components.json
libraries.description: Antennas, coaxial cables, RF filters, matching networks, attenuators

libraries.name: power_distribution.json
libraries.description: Circuit breakers, fuses, surge protection, busbars, isolators

libraries.name: output_devices.json
libraries.description: LEDs, LCD/OLED displays, 7-segment displays, buzzers, speakers

libraries.name: connectors.json
libraries.description: USB, HDMI, Ethernet, audio, DC power, headers, RF connectors

usage_guide.loading_libraries: Each library is loaded on demand by the component library panel
usage_guide.adding_components: Select from library and drag to canvas
usage_guide.creating_custom: Edit JSON files directly or use component wizard

notes: Comprehensive EEE component support including passive, active, digital, analog, RF, sensors, electromechanical, and power distribution components. All components follow international standards.
